extendedInfo.description: AGENDA CALENDAR WIDGETNEW: LIMITED OFFER: ONLY $1,29!============================================A clean and easy to use Calendar/Agenda Widget to show and to edit your events. It synchronizes with the default calendar and provides following key features:- 6 different widget sizes (4x1, 4x2, 4?3, 4x4 and 6x2, 6x4 designed for tablets), more are coming- Smooth events scrolling- Pick calendars to show events from- Enter new events and open your calendar from the widget- Fold / unfold the buttons panel to provide more space for the events- Highlight today events- Filter out all-day events- Show day of the week in event date- The ability to change the text color- Make background transparent (may require widget reset)- Show the week numbers- Change font size- Group events by date...and much more!Of course you are still welcome to test the free version with reduced functionality: market://details?id=com.byteartist.widgetPlease contact me in case you have any suggestions or experience problems at contact@byteartist.comThank you!

reviews.title: Great widget!
reviews.comment: Clean look and easy to up. Can customize everything. Really nice job.
reviews.author: Peter Friedman

reviews.title: Five stars
reviews.comment: Great app, and fast response for my one issue that was easily fixed!
reviews.author: Matthew Rentz

reviews.title: Best calendar widget on the marketplace
reviews.comment: This is, without a doubt, worth every penny I spent on it. It is absolutely the best simple calendar widget for Android. This is actually a follow up from my last review, which made a few feature requests, all of which were addressed in the latest update. This developer actually cares about his customers and listens to feedback! Trust me, if you get this app, you won\'t be disappointed!
reviews.author: Zachary Murray

reviews.title: It\'s pretty good, but I\'m having issues
reviews.comment: Facebook dates are inaccurate.  I tried watching the video that is included for instructions.  I think you it\'s time for a new one.  It\'s difficult to follow, with the low resolution, music blarring and little to no instruction.  How do I fix this bug with dates in Facebook?
reviews.author: Federico Robinson

reviews.title: Great calendar widget!
reviews.comment: Excellent widget with great developer support. A glitch I had was responded to in minutes!  Would love to see new types of layouts, like a week view or daily agenda,but it is excellent regardless.
reviews.author: Joel Schneider

reviews.title: Great widget but All text is the same color
reviews.comment: Changing the event date, group date and event text different colors would make this widget perfect. I\'ve stopped using it because all of the fields blur together. Will change to 5 stars if fixed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Clean Calendar Widget
reviews.comment: Excellent on my Galaxy S III. Clean an easy to use.
reviews.author: Unique Alliance Virtual Assistant

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: Get it! This is very well done, with lots of customization options.  Thanks dev!
reviews.author: Sam Borsman

reviews.comment: Great app
reviews.author: daniel mullan

reviews.comment: Great calender
reviews.author: Brian Steinlage

reviews.comment: Not bad
reviews.author: Peter Frost

reviews.title: An ok app
reviews.comment: I can\'t get it to separate today and tomorrows events with the menu option and it doesn\'t refresh when I add or remove calenders. Any free app can do what this app does but better. Disappointing and a waste of money.  Update: Found a much better free app. You should test this a bit more; esp with lots of calendar groups. Btw, good support should never immediately blame the user.
reviews.author: Vincent Dinicola

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: So easy to use, and easy to see your appointments.. only one thing.. text size configuration :) but 5/5
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I love it. Very customizable.  I get a clear view of events and tasks with no fuss.
reviews.author: Ned Arbogast

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Thanks for the update.  Very configurable . It was just what I was looking for. The update solved the only problem I had with the previous version. Works great, if your looking for a calendar widget I highly recommend this one.
reviews.author: Ta Gink

reviews.title: I like the look of it
reviews.comment: but it hasn\'t been installed very long. Very configurable. I like this app.
reviews.author: Joan Tilston

reviews.title: Everything I was looking for !!!
reviews.comment: Running S3 with HyperDrive ROM and Next Launcher  3D, looks Great with my Theme. Very customizable and works GREAT. Thank You for making it....
reviews.author: Louis Russo

reviews.title: Verry customizable
reviews.comment: Nice! font size, font color, highlight color, event padding, event filter and group customization (PRO version) various widget sizes and display themes. Great job!  Also it separates days of the week, and you can set the refresh interval
reviews.author: Vlad Pop

reviews.title: Best Calendar widget.
reviews.comment: LOVE all the customizations to get it just as I wanted it. Works great!
reviews.author: kimberly teich

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I like the app, but there\'s this letter K showing.
reviews.author: Don Vaillancourt
